wikitext.*:
On [[19 June]] [[1967]], [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] wrote '''[[Letters not published in The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien|a letter]] to [[Donald Swann]]'''.
*'''Subject:''' Tolkien thanks Swann for the book cover and compares the "t" rendered there to various occurrences from genuine manuscripts.<ref>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=https://www.tolkienguide.com/guide/letters/978|articlename=TCG Letter #978|dated=|website=[https://www.tolkienguide.com/ Tolkien Collector's Guide]|accessed=17 March 2024}}</ref>
*'''Archive:''' Wade Center Archives<ref>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=https://www.wheaton.edu/media/wade-center/files/collections/letter-listings/JRRT_Papers_20220909.pdf|articlename=The J.R.R. Tolkien Papers|dated=|website=[https://www.wheaton.edu/ Wheaton.edu]|accessed=17 March 2024}}</ref>
{{references}}
